import React from 'react'; import * as actions from '../actions/pos'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {useState} from 'react'; import './forms.css' function WareHouse(props){ const intialvalues={ itemBrand:'Haier', itemType:'AC', ModelNumber:'', Quantity:'', WareHouseID:'1', } const [values,setValues] = useState(intialvalues); const handleSubmit =e=>{ console.log("Now Putting into lists") e.preventDefault(); console.log(values); props.createPos(values,()=>{window.alert('New Product Added to Inventory')}) } const handleInputChange=e=>{ const {name,value}=e.target setValues({ ...values, [name]: value }) } return(

WareHouse Management

Add New items in stock

Stock Transfer

); } actions.TableString.StringOfTable="StockDetails"; const mapStateToProps = state=>({ poslist: state.pos.list }) const mapActionToProps = { createPos: actions.create, } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapActionToProps)(WareHouse);
